remarks: Reverse triangle inequality for the distance function of a metric space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
mscl.x $e |- X = ( Base ` M ) $.
mscl.d $e |- D = ( dist ` M ) $.
